groupbuilder.core.data_model_converter module

Data Model Converter Module

This module provides utility functions for converting custom data model objects to standard Python dictionaries and lists.

convert_group_to_list(group)

Convert a Group object to a list.

convert_round_to_dict(round_)

Convert a Round object to a dictionary.

convert_rounds_to_dict(rounds)

Convert a Rounds object to a dictionary.
groupbuilder.core.data_model_converter.convert_group_to_list(group)[source]

Convert a Group object to a list.

This function extracts the IDs from a Group object and returns them as a list.

Parameters:

group (Group) – The Group object to convert

Returns:

The list representation of the Group object, only retaining the ids

Return type:

list

groupbuilder.core.data_model_converter.convert_round_to_dict(round_)[source]

Convert a Round object to a dictionary.

This function converts a Round object to a dictionary, and handles nested Group objects by converting them to lists.

Parameters:

round (Round) – The Round object to convert

Returns:

The dictionary representation of the Round object

Return type:

dict

groupbuilder.core.data_model_converter.convert_rounds_to_dict(rounds)[source]

Convert a Rounds object to a dictionary.

This function converts a Rounds object to a dictionary, and handles nested Round objects by converting them to dictionaries.

Parameters:

rounds (Rounds) – The Rounds object to convert

Returns:

The dictionary representation of the Rounds object

Return type:

dict
